resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158797</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1032</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Hoax or Real?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hokuspokus oder reales?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Canular ou vrai ?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Hoax ou real?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Hoax o reale?</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξαπάτηση ή πραγματικός;</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">¿Broma o verdadero?</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Many people believe what they see, others believe what read and still others believe what they hear. In this activity learners will read about a hoax that actually happened and report how it was created, by whom and why.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hoax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">prank</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Viele Leute glauben was sie sehen, andere glauben, daß 
was las und noch glauben andere, was sie hören. In dieser 
Aktivität lesen Anfänger über einen Hokuspokus, daß wirklich 
geschehen und Report, wie er erstellt wurden, durch den und warum.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Beaucoup de gens croient ce qu'elles voient, d'autres 
croient que ce qui a lu et encore d'autres croient ce qu'elles 
entendent. Dans cette activité les étudiants auront 
connaissance d'un canular que réellement produit et état comment lui
ont été créés, par qui et pourquoi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Muitos povos acreditam o que vêem, outros acreditam que o
que leu e ainda outro acredita o que se ouvem. Nesta atividade 
os learners lerão sobre um hoax que acontecido realmente e relatório
como foram criados, por quem e porque.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Molta gente crede che cosa vedono, altri crede che che 
cosa ha letto ed ancora altri credono che cosa si sentono. In 
questa attività principianti leggeranno su un hoax che realmente 
accaduto e rapporto come esso sono stati creati, da quale e perchè.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πολλοί άνθρωποι θεωρούν τι που βλέπουνε, άλλοι 
θεωρούν τι διαβάζει και ακόμα άλλοι θεωρούν τι ακούνε. Σε 
αυτήν την δραστηριότητα οι αρχάριοι θα διαβάσουν για μια 
εξαπάτηση που συνέβη πραγματικά και έκθεση πώς δημιουργήθηκε, 
από το οποίο και γιατί.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Mucha gente cree lo que ella ve, otros cree que qué leyó
y todavía otros creen lo que ella oye. En esta actividad los 
principiantes leerán sobre una broma que sucedido realmente e informe
cómo él fueron creados, por el cual y porqué.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hokuspokus</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Streich</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">plan de leçon</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">canular</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">polisson</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">hoax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">prank</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">programma di lezione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">hoax</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">prank</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">σχέδιο μαθήματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξαπάτηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">φάρσα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">plan de la lección</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">broma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">prank</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
